Useful for creation of XSL stylesheets for GP Work Item creation. Separate multiple values by \ (backslash). LogStationAETitles java.lang.String List of the AE titles for Modalities which emits MPPS messages according the Presentation of Grouped Procedure (PGP) defined by the IHE Radiology Technical Framework. Separate multiple values by \ (backslash).
